document_data.caption: A map showing Rednose and surroundings in the Southern Ward of Waterdeep.
document_data.name: Rednose Alley
document_data.mainbody: '''Rednose Alley''' was a small back alley that was located in the city of [[Waterdeep]].{{Cite interactive atlas|Waterdeep}}
document_data.Location: Rednose Alley was located in the north section of Waterdeep's [[Waterdeep/Southern Ward|Southern Ward]]. The alley branched west from the north side of [[Tezambril's Street]]. It encircled a small villa within the neighborhood.
document_data.Activities: Many of the warehouses lining the alley served as homes for destitute youths who fought each other regularly.
document_data.Notable Locations: The back side of the [[Saddlers' & Harness-Makers' Hall]] faced Rednose Alley.
